categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Silas Carson (born 1965) is an English actor who played Nute Gunray, Lott Dod, Ki-Adi-Mundi and Antidar Williams, the pilot who died at the beginning of Episode I.

Outside of Star Wars, Carson also made a guest appearance on the UK series Hustle, Strike Back, The Bill and Spooks. He provided the voice of the Adherents of the Repeated Meme for the Doctor Who episode The End of the World and voices the alien race Ood in the episodes The Impossible Planet, Planet of the Ood and The End of Time.
He also appeared in the films Fever Pitch, Boogie Woogie (with Christopher Lee) and Hidalgo, and in the television shows Supply & Demand, How Not to Live Your Life,and Cold Lazarus.
